POI properties Hold down "Control", or "Command" on a Mac, to select more than one.

Minimal zoom modificator (use 20+ to show always).

  • Invalid geometry type.

Add point: Select pencil with plus sign icon and place your point to the map.
Add line: Select line icon and by clicking to map draw the line. Finish drawing with double click.
Add area: Select area icon and by clicking to mapy draw the area. Finish drawing with double click.
Object edition: Select the first icon and then select object in map. Draw points in map to move them, use points in the middle of sections to add new edges.
